q_ch: Master Cutters当前已完成的裁剪任务有哪些？
q_en: Which cutting tasks have been completed by Master Cutters?
gt:
Hey there! 😄 Let's take a look at the cutting tasks completed by the "Master Cutters" group. Here's what I found:

| Task ID | Start Time          | End Time            | Planned Number | Completed Number |
|---------|---------------------|---------------------|----------------|------------------|
| 3       | January 10, 2024    | January 19, 2024    | 150            | 150              |

The "Master Cutters" have successfully completed their task with flying colors! 🎉 If you have any more questions, feel free to ask!

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Master Cutters';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for "Master Cutters"

steps.sql: SELECT ct.id, ct.start_time, ct.end_time, ct.planned_number, ct.completed_number FROM cutting_tasks ct WHERE ct.working_group_id = '3' AND ct.status = 2;
steps.description: Retrieve the completed cutting tasks for the working group "Master Cutters"
